summary:
This is a retexture mod of Bloodskal Blade.
Looks like so heat,as \"Inferno\"!
And not only so,but also it glows in a night!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Impact][size=6]Bloodskal Blade Retexture[/size]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35775-1-1367940928.jpg[/img]
[size=7][color=Crimson]-Inferno Edition-[/color][/size][/font]
[font=Arial Black][size=4]If you are satisfied with this mod,please endorse![/size][/font]


[font=Arial Black][size=6][color=Dodgerblue][b]-Description-[/b][/color][/size][/font]
[size=4][FONT=Arial Black]
This is a retexture mod of Bloodskal Blade.
Looks like so heat,as \"[color=crimson]Inferno[/color]\"!

And not only so,but also it [u]glows [color=red]red[/color] in a night![/u][/size]
[size=5]Anyway show images![/font][/size]
author: metametroid
